did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Jack Lee Cross was the editor of the University of Arizona Press from 1960 to 1965. This book was published by the University of Arizona Press, 1960, as part of the observance of the University's 75th anniversary of founding.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Arizona, Its People and Resources (AZ 019). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jack Lee Cross was the editor of the University of Arizona Press from 1960 to 1965. This book was published by the University of Arizona Press, 1960, as part of the observance of the University's 75th anniversary of founding.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 2 Series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This book was published by the University of Arizona Press, 1960, as part of the observance of the University's 75th anniversary of founding. Original typescripts with holograph corrections, as submitted by the contributors to the editors. Most contributors are University of Arizona faculty members. Includes correspondence and some material not used in the completed volume.
